info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 02 at 7:31PM PDT until September 02 at 7:45PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM PDT FOR WEST CENTRAL CLACKAMAS AND CENTRAL MARION COUNTIES... At 730 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Silverton, or 18 miles northeast of Salem, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Silverton, Mount Angel, Scotts Mills, Monitor, and Marquam. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
